description: Non-material amendment to 20/03530/FUL to allow changes to condition 7 to state the following - prior to the commencement of construction above Damp Proof Course.
decision_conditions: The Council has considered your application and confirms that the proposals are acceptable as non-material amendments to the planning permission set out above. For the purposes of this decision, condition no.7 of planning permission 20/03530/FUL shall be replaced with the following condition: REPLACEMENT CONDITION 7: Prior to the commencement of construction above the damp proof course, details of the surfacing materials to be used within the development including footpaths, access roads and parking areas and road markings have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The surfacing shall be carried out in accordance with the approved detail before the development is occupied or use commences.Reason: To ensure that the development does not prejudice highway safety and a satisfactory appearance.
